inbox.emptyDescription: Connect with friends to start sharing sessions

connect.invalidSecretKey: Invalid secret key. Please check and try again.

settings.title: Settings
settings.aboutFooter: Happy Coder is a Codex and Claude Code mobile client. It's fully end-to-end encrypted and your account is stored only on your device. Not affiliated with Anthropic.
settings.whatsNewSubtitle: See the latest updates and improvements
settings.usageSubtitle: View your API usage and costs

settingsAppearance.inlineToolCallsDescription: Display tool calls directly in chat messages
settingsAppearance.expandTodoListsDescription: Show all todos instead of just changes
settingsAppearance.showLineNumbersInDiffsDescription: Display line numbers in code diffs
settingsAppearance.showLineNumbersInToolViews: Show Line Numbers in Tool Views
settingsAppearance.showLineNumbersInToolViewsDescription: Display line numbers in tool view diffs
settingsAppearance.wrapLinesInDiffsDescription: Wrap long lines instead of horizontal scrolling in diff views
settingsAppearance.alwaysShowContextSizeDescription: Display context usage even when not near limit
settingsAppearance.showFlavorIconsDescription: Display AI provider icons on session avatars
settingsAppearance.compactSessionViewDescription: Show active sessions in a more compact layout

settingsFeatures.experimentsDescription: Enable experimental features that are still in development. These features may be unstable or change without notice.
settingsFeatures.webFeaturesDescription: Features available only in the web version of the app.
settingsFeatures.hideInactiveSessionsSubtitle: Show only active chats in your list
settingsFeatures.groupSessionsByProjectSubtitle: Group past sessions by their working directory
settingsFeatures.notificationsDescription: Configure how you receive alerts about your sessions.

errors.contactSupport: Contact support if the problem persists
errors.oauthStateMismatch: Security validation failed. Please try again
errors.sessionDeletedDescription: This session has been permanently removed
errors.messagesLoadingTimeout: Messages are taking longer than usual to load
errors.retryIn: Retry in {seconds} second | Retry in {seconds} seconds
errors.connectServiceFailed: Failed to connect {service}. Please try again.
errors.claudeTokenExpired: Claude authentication expired. Please reconnect your account.
errors.claudeNotConnected: Claude account not connected. Go to Settings to connect.
errors.claudeTokenRefreshFailed: Failed to refresh Claude token. Please reconnect your account.
errors.claudeApiError: Claude API request failed. Please try again.

newSession.title: Start New Session
newSession.noMachinesFound: No machines found. Start a Happy session on your computer first.
newSession.createDirectoryConfirm: The directory {directory} does not exist. Do you want to create it?
newSession.sessionStartedMessage: The session has been started successfully.
newSession.sessionSpawningFailed: Session spawning failed - no session ID returned.
newSession.failedToStart: Failed to start session. Make sure the daemon is running on the target machine.
newSession.sessionTimeout: Session startup timed out. The machine may be slow or the daemon may not be responding.
newSession.notConnectedToServer: Not connected to server. Check your internet connection.
newSession.noMachineSelected: Please select a machine to start the session
newSession.noPathSelected: Please select a directory to start the session in
newSession.sessionStartingSlow: Session is starting slowly. It will appear in your sessions list once ready. You may need to send your prompt again.
newSession.sessionStartFailed: Session failed to start. The daemon may not have responded in time. Please check CLI logs and try again.

sessionHistory.title: Session History
sessionHistory.resumeDescription: This will create a new session with the full conversation history from the original. The original session will remain unchanged.
sessionHistory.resumeRequiresMachine: Machine must be online to resume
sessionHistory.resumeClaudeOnly: Resume is only available for Claude sessions

server.advancedFeatureFooter: This is an advanced feature. Only change the server if you know what you're doing. You will need to log out and log in again after changing servers.
server.invalidJsonResponse: Server response is not valid JSON. Make sure the URL points to a Happy Server API, not a web page.
server.missingRequiredFields: Server response is missing required fields: {fields}
server.incompatibleVersion: Server version {serverVersion} is not compatible. Minimum required version is {requiredVersion}.

sessionRevival.revivingDescription: Your session stopped unexpectedly. Attempting to restore.
sessionRevival.failedDescription: The session stopped and could not be revived automatically.
sessionRevival.unknownError: An unknown error occurred during revival
